meanings.definition: The leading or most important position in a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: In the foreranks of the team, the captain always led the way.
meanings.sent2: The CEO always stands in the foreranks during company meetings.
meanings.sent3: The foreranks of the school play were filled with talented actors.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication placed her in the foreranks of the charity organization.
meanings.sent5: The foreranks of the army were filled with brave soldiers ready for battle.

meanings.definition: To be at the forefront or in the front ranks of something.
meanings.sent1: She foreranks in the race, setting a fast pace for the others.
meanings.sent2: The new technology foreranks in efficiency compared to older models.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel foreranks in gathering nuts for the winter ahead.
meanings.sent4: His determination foreranks in achieving his goals against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The student foreranks in the class by always being prepared and attentive.
